tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Would definitely recommend. Will visit again for RCT. He charges nominally and is patient to hear out your complaints.
The doctors and staff are very cordial and helping nature as well as highly professional. Treatment is also best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Excellent service. He is very understanding of the issue and explain the action plan clearly. Highly recommended

I took my dental treatment a month back, i am satisfied, giving my comments after one month only. no any other problem faced after the treatment.
Reasonable cost, friendly, No long waiting time.  I am happy to recommend to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He explaines about the issues before treatment..friendly in nature..my long term tooth issues have been cleared.. Well satisfied treatment.. Thankyou

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had severe pain  and consulted the doctor  he advised for RCT and immediately  done  after an hour I relived from pain 
I am so much better  and thankful to Doctor for correct diagnosis and treatment .
The dentist i prefer to go always... a dentist who explains you about the problem clearly and gives you a better idea about the treatment you need...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was so caring he treated my daughter with great care. After recovery and medication was clearly explained.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Good day, 
I went for teeth filling and they exactly diagnosed that cavity was went inside however it was not noticed from outside. 

Doctor Veeraragavan and doctor Varsha was followed up the treatment in a professional way. 
Their appointment and follow up system was very good. 

I was completely satisfied with the treatment and recommended others. 

Thanks
**** ********* *** satisfied I am recommend This Dr, I am personal very much satisfied this Clinics
